main event: A civilian woman reported a UFO sighting involving a blue-white object with a red top that performed strange and level maneuvers.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 0645 hours., The observation was conducted via ground radar., The length of the observation lasted for 1 unit of time., There were other reports of a fireball in the area at the same time., The object was described as strange and maneuvering levelly.
sighted object: blue-white object with a red top
